data: {"generalSituation":"Under the influence of the winter monsoon, it will be cold in the morning over the coast of Guangdong in the next couple of days. It will be fine and very dry with rather large temperature difference between day and night. The monsoon will moderate slightly during the weekend to early next week. It will still be cool in the morning over the coast of Guangdong. A replenishment of the monsoon is expected to affect the coast of southern China midweek next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260106","week":"Tuesday","forecastWind":"North force 5, force 6 offshore and on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Fine and dry.
